00040 #ifndef _simpletimer_h
00041 #define _simpletimer_h
00042 
00043 #include "timer.h"
00044 
00045 namespace phys
00046 {
00047     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00048     /// @class SimpleTimer
00049     /// @headerfile simpletimer.h
00050     /// @brief A basic timer class that can be used to track short intervals of time.
00051     /// @details This timer class should be used only for shorter periods, such as tracking ability cooldowns or gun fire rates.
00052     /// For longer periods of time look at the EnhancedTimer class.
00053     ///////////////////////////////////////
00054     class SimpleTimer : public Timer
00055     {
00056         protected:
00057             Whole CurrentTime;
00058             Whole GoalTime;
00059             Whole InitialTime;
00060             virtual void Update(const Whole MicroSecondsElapsed);
00061             virtual void UpdateAsNormal(const Whole MicroSecondsElapsed);
00062             virtual void UpdateAsStopWatch(const Whole MicroSecondsElapsed);
00063             virtual void UpdateAsAlarm(const Whole MicroSecondsElapsed);
00064             virtual bool GoalReached();
00065         public:
00066             /// @brief Standard Constructor.
00067             /// @param Style The styling/type of timer to be constructed.
00068             SimpleTimer(const Timer::TimerStyle style);
00069             /// @brief Class destructor.
00070             virtual ~SimpleTimer();
00071             /// @brief Sets the current value to it's initial value.
00072             virtual void Reset();
00073             /// @brief Sets whether or not the Timer should reset if it reaches it's goal.  @n
00074             /// Ex. If a stopwatch reaches 0.
00075             /// @return Returns a reference to this timer.
00076             virtual SimpleTimer& SetAutoReset(const bool AutoReset);
00077             /// @brief Sets the current time.
00078             /// @return Returns a reference to this timer.
00079             /// @param Current The value to set as current time in Microseconds.
00080             virtual SimpleTimer& SetCurrentTime(const Whole Current);
00081             /// @brief Sets the goal time.
00082             /// @return Returns a reference to this timer.
00083             /// @param Goal The value to set as goal time in Microseconds.
00084             virtual SimpleTimer& SetGoalTime(const Whole Goal);
00085             /// @brief Sets the initial time.
00086             /// @return Returns a reference to this timer.
00087             /// @param Initial The value to set as initial time in Microseconds.
00088             virtual SimpleTimer& SetInitialTime(const Whole Initial);
00089             /// @brief Gets the Current time in Microseconds.
00090             /// @return Returns a Whole representing the current time in Microseconds.
00091             virtual Whole GetCurrentTime();
00092             /// @brief Gets the Goal time in Microseconds.
00093             /// @return Returns a Whole representing the goal time in Microseconds.
00094             virtual Whole GetGoalTime();
00095             /// @brief Gets the Initial time in Microseconds.
00096             /// @return Returns a Whole representing the initial time in Microseconds.
00097             virtual Whole GetInitialTime();
00098             /// @brief Gets the Current time in Milliseconds.
00099             /// @return Returns a Whole representing the current time in Milliseconds.
00100             virtual Whole GetCurrentTimeInMilli();
00101             /// @brief Gets the Goal time in Milliseconds.
00102             /// @return Returns a Whole representing the goal time in Milliseconds.
00103             virtual Whole GetGoalTimeInMilli();
00104             /// @brief Gets the Initial time in Milliseconds.
00105             /// @return Returns a Whole representing the initial time in Milliseconds.
00106             virtual Whole GetInitialTimeInMilli();
00107     };
00108 }
00109 
00110 #endif
